analysis.description:
Recoverable.recoverTokens (/unique_chucks/27/0x3a4c9cf1450b7fa7c78f8abfa7002292cb38695d.sol#376-383) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.transfer(owner,tokensToBeReturned(token)) (/unique_chucks/27/0x3a4c9cf1450b7fa7c78f8abfa7002292cb38695d.sol#377-383)

MintableToken.mint (/unique_chucks/27/0x3a4c9cf1450b7fa7c78f8abfa7002292cb38695d.sol#502-512) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- require(bool)(block.timestamp > mintLockPeriod) (/unique_chucks/27/0x3a4c9cf1450b7fa7c78f8abfa7002292cb38695d.sol#510)

MintableToken.mintLockPeriod should be constant (/unique_chucks/27/0x3a4c9cf1450b7fa7c78f8abfa7002292cb38695d.sol#459-460)
UpgradeAgent.originalSupply should be constant (/unique_chucks/27/0x3a4c9cf1450b7fa7c78f8abfa7002292cb38695d.sol#169)
Ownable.renounceOwnership (/unique_chucks/27/0x3a4c9cf1450b7fa7c78f8abfa7002292cb38695d.sol#138-139) should be declared external
